content: stitch central ruby cowl worsted-weight cowl with choose-your-own adventure mosaic and stripe sections designed by danielle gallagher for knitters day out 2025 knitters day out 2025 materials -2 skeins of 100g worsted weight yarn such as malabrigo rios one ruby and one background bg -20 circular needles sizes us 6 & us 8 -stitch marker darning needle gauge 20 sts = 4 in stockinette info this cowl is worked in the round with alternating mosaic stitch and striped sections feel free to play around adding more stripes featuring just one mosaic section halfway or adding length follow pattern for a snug cowl or make it any circumference you d like by adding/subtracting stitches any multiple of 4 will do finished measurements 20 around 8 high instructions ribbing section ruby mosaic section with bg color on smaller needles cast on 108 sts round 1 ruby *sl1 k1* repeat from *to* to end of round join to work in the round being careful not to twist round 2 ruby *sl1 wyib p1* repeat from *to* to end of round place marker for beginning of round round 3 bg k1 *sl1 k3* repeat to last 3 sts sl1 k2 twisted rib *k1tbl p1* repeat from * to * to end round 4 bg repeat row 3 of round round 5 ruby *k3 sl1* repeat from *to* to end of round work 6 rounds of twisted rib round 6 ruby *p3 sl1 wyib* repeat from *to* to end of round round 7 bg repeat row 3 body of cowl round 8 bg repeat row 3 round 9 ruby repeat row 1 transition to larger needles knit 2 rounds round 10 ruby repeat row 2 join ruby yarn carry unused yarn loosely up the inside striped section work ruby mosaic and striped sections in round 1 bg knit any order you like for a total of about 50 row round 2 bg knit each 10-row section will measure approx 1 5 round 3 ruby knit some ideas start with ruby mosaic then work round 4 ruby purl abbreviations repeat row 1-4 one more striped section ruby mosaic striped and one k knit time then work row 1 & 2 more ruby mosaic p purl once more to complete the work striped section twice ruby mosaic once tbl through the back loop section and striped twice more wyib with yarn held to the back of work finishing repeat repeat once body of cowl is done cut ruby yarn st s stitch es knit 2 rnds with bg yarn round round switch to smaller needles work twisted rib bg background color for 6 rnds bind off loosely weave in ends and block
